name: Freestyle Song Maker
description:
Make music with your device that will captivate your audience! The Freesytle Song Maker puts the hottest freestyle beats, melody and bass lines at your fingertips.

Produce impressive results in no time even without any prior knowledge. Just by tapping the sample blocks you can develop your own hit songs/beats that will make your friends dance.

Freesytle Song Maker is a fun & creative sample machine. Play cool & hot drumbeats, cool kicks, cymbals, smashing power snares, phrases, melodies, stabs, chords, powerful synths and other sound effects. Create your own hit beats. Jam directly on your device. Plug in your headphones and enjoy the sounds & music.
